parameter.name: deviceAddress
parameter.label: WMBus device address
parameter.description: Identifier which lets to find device (in hexdecimal format).

parameter.name: frequencyOfUpdates
parameter.label: Frequency of updates
parameter.description: Frequency of updates sent by device. This value is used to determine if device goes offline. Recommended value depends on manufacturer and specific meter and should be adjusted manually. Defaults to 60 minutes which is quite long.

thing-type.label: Encrypted WMBus device
thing-type.description: WMBus device which uses secured communication - you need to provide a encryption key to read reported values.
